alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 04 at 4:33AM AKDT until June 05 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON AKDT TODAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Chalkyitsik and west. * TIMING...Noon to 10 pm Saturday and again Sunday. * WINDS...Northeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph during the afternoon and into the evening hours. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...65 to 75. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
